pages.text: The $(item)Sentient Sword$() is a much more effective tool for collecting $(l:demon_will/demon_will)$(item)Demon Will$() than $(l:demon_will/soulsnare)$(item)Soul Snares$() could ever hope to be It may seem weak at first, but it is powered by the Wills you carry, so crafting a $(l:demon_will/soulgem)$(item)Tartaric Gem$() is a must.

pages.heading: Sentient Sword
pages.text: This sword will serve you well.
